name: Wildfire - The Revivalist - Toro
additionalNotes: One of the newest cigar brands on the market is Wildfire Cigar Co. The brand is owned by Jeremy McDonald who was the national sales manager for Caldwell Cigar Co. from early 2014 until 2020. The company debuted with two lines, the limited edition Wildfire The Single and the regular production Wildfire The Revivalist. The blend for The Revivalist uses a Mexican claro wrapper, Nicaraguan binder, and Indonesian and Nicaraguan fillers.
